actionTemplate.title: Fix an overly arched, lifted brow tail
steps: Aim for brow tail to be level with or slightly higher than brow head
Clean up: remove hair under brow head and above the arch/tail
Fill the top edge at brow head, and the bottom edge at arch/tail
Keep the brow shape flatter and smoother
Blend: brow head light, brow waist deeper

rationaleTemplate: A flatter brow reads softer and more youthful
Balancing top/bottom edges corrects the “hanging” look
